summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6639 for the improvement of Broadway E. from E. Howe St. to E. Boston St.; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 103774, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
